definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

sentences.english: The company has more than ten patents, technical force is abundant.
sentences.chinese: 公司拥有十余项专利，技术力量雄厚。

sentences.english: And he has accomplished more than 50 scientific research projects at national and ministerial level.
sentences.chinese: 承担和完成国家级和省部级科研项目50余项。

sentences.english: The asymptotic behavior theorems of the "midpoint" of remainder in the midpoint formula and their applications are presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 给出中点公式余项“中间点”的渐进性定理及其应用。

sentences.english: It makes us possible to estimate the remainder .
sentences.chinese: 它可使我们能估计余项。

sentences.english: In the past, he had undertaken more than 10 domestic or foreign grants.
sentences.chinese: 曾承担或主要参加国内外项目10余项。

definition: back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc
domestic and international/at home and abroad
three items/three events/three terms/tri-/trinomial, ternary (math.)/triathlon (abbr. for 三項全能|三项全能)
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
